item.title: OAuth and Azure API Management
item.description: This series explores different scenarios for implementing OAuth with Azure API Management. We cover both protecting APIs with OAuth and calling OAuth-protected resources from various Azure services and CI/CD pipelines.

item.title: Client Certificates and mTLS in API Management
item.description: This series covers how to work with client certificates in Azure API Management to set up mutual TLS (mTLS) connections. We explore both validating client certificates in API Management and connecting to backends using mTLS.
